org.apache.hadoop.fs

Class TestLocalFileSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.TestLocalFileSystem

  • public class TestLocalFileSystem
extends Object
    This class tests the local file system via the FileSystem abstraction.

      • testRenameReplaceExistingEmptyDirectory

        public void testRenameReplaceExistingEmptyDirectory()
                                             throws IOException
        Tests that renaming a directory replaces the destination if the destination is an existing empty directory. Before: /dir1 /file1 /file2 /dir2 After rename("/dir1", "/dir2"): /dir2 /file1 /file2
        Throws:
        IOException

      • testRenameMoveToExistingNonEmptyDirectory

        public void testRenameMoveToExistingNonEmptyDirectory()
                                               throws IOException
        Tests that renaming a directory to an existing directory that is not empty results in a full copy of source to destination. Before: /dir1 /dir2 /dir3 /file1 /file2 After rename("/dir1/dir2/dir3", "/dir1"): /dir1 /dir3 /file1 /file2
        Throws:
        IOException
